scripts.lib:t:esm: lerna exec --scope @uiw-admin/basic-layouts -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT
scripts.lib:t:cjs: lerna exec --scope @uiw-admin/basic-layouts -- tsbb types --outDir lib/cjs --target ESNEXT
scripts.lib:type: npm run lib:t:esm & npm run lib:t:cjs
scripts.lib:build: npm run lib:b && npm run lib:type && npm run lib:css
scripts.lib:w:type: npm run lib:t:esm -- --watch & npm run lib:t:cjs -- --watch
scripts.type: npm run t:cjs && npm run t:esm
scripts.t:esm: lerna exec --scope @uiw-admin/* -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT
scripts.t:cjs: lerna exec --scope @uiw-admin/* -- tsbb types --outDir lib/cjs --target ESNEXT
scripts.build: npm run b:lib && npm run type && npm run b:css
scripts.watch: lerna exec --scope @uiw-admin/* -- tsbb watch --target react & npm run w:css
scripts.publish: npm run build && lerna publish from-package
